Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands in added white; exterior: spiked swastika with rounded angles as filling ornament.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the filling ornament, see Lemos no. 369 from Rizari.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0070) (phase 2)
